article: Today we  have  only three lessons in the morning. The first lesson is math. It  starts  at eight o'clock and finishes at  a quarter  to nine. It is in Room 101. But I don't like math. Then the second lesson is my favorite  subject  --music. It starts at nine o'clock. The  _  lesson in the morning is PE. It starts at ten  _  ten and finishes at five to eleven. We have our lunch at eleven thirty  _  the second floor of dining hall. We have two lessons  _  lunch. Art starts at two and at three o'clock we have a  _  lesson. We can learn a lot of knowledge about China. At about four in the afternoon  class  is over.
